verbs.description: [ARG0: Mexico] [V: says] [ARG1: it will answer tariffs on steel and aluminum announced by the Trump administration with duties of its own on a variety of U.S. products] .
Mexico says it [V: will] answer tariffs on steel and aluminum announced by the Trump administration with duties of its own on a variety of U.S. products .
Mexico says [ARG0: it] [ARGM-MOD: will] [V: answer] [ARG1: tariffs on steel and aluminum announced by the Trump administration with duties of its own on a variety of U.S. products] .
Mexico says it will answer [ARG1: tariffs on steel and aluminum] [V: announced] [ARG0: by the Trump administration] [ARG3: with duties of its own on a variety of U.S. products] .
